summary: An environmental and Earth scientist and sustainability professional passionate about supporting innovative solutions for complex problems. Recent graduate of the Sustainable Business and Innovation (MSc) program at Utrecht University. My interests include climate change adaptation, sustainability, disaster mitigation, food systems, impact reporting, scientific communication, and organizational resilience.
